content: उत्कम् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go up, step up, ascend. {@--2@} To step beyond; उत्क्रांतशैशवौ <ls>R. 15. 33</ls> past childhood. {@--3@} To step out, go out or away, depart; ऊर्ध्वं प्राणा ह्युत्कामतिं <ls>Ms. 2. 120</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To pass away, die. {@--5@} To go or pass over, omit. {@--6@} To disregard, not to notice, neglect; आर्षं प्रमाणमुत्क्रम्य, धर्ममुत्क्रग्य <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--7@} To transgress, violate; उत्क्रांतसीमा <ls>Dk. 101</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">97.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (क्रामयति) To cause to go up or ascend.
